name: Shadows of Revenge
description:
Enter the shadowy realm of "Shadows of Revenge," a gripping roguelike deckbuilding game set in the treacherous mafia underworld of Manhattan. Assume the role of a disgraced family boss, driven by the thirst for power and redemption, as you engage in intense neighborhood-by-neighborhood combat, plan daring heists, and fend off rival mafia families seeking to reclaim their territories. Craft a cunning deck of loyal gang members, navigate through a city tainted by corruption, and decide the fate of your family in this strategic, blood-soaked journey to rule the mafia realm.

Overview


Shadows of Revenge puts you into the sinister heart of a mafia-dominated Manhattan. As the boss of a once-proud family now fallen into disgrace, your journey to reclaim the city will test your wit, resourcefulness and determination.

Key Features


  • Deck Building: Craft a lethal deck of unique cards, each representing a key member of your "famiglia" or a weapon. Utilize their distinct abilities to gain an edge in intense turn-based battles.

  • Map Strategy and Domination: Strategize your takeover of Manhattan's neighborhoods, engaging in tactical combat per territory. Survey the city map, plan your moves, and dominate rival mafia factions to extend your influence.

  • Heists: Dive into the clandestine world of heists, where story-based missions can elevate your resources or plunge you into ruin. Give your cards unique combination of resources specifically for these missions.

  • Run Businesses and Earn Money: Establish and manage businesses in conquered neighborhoods to generate revenue and expand your criminal empire. Invest wisely and ensure a steady flow of income to support your revenge.

  • Defend Conquered Neighborhoods: Be aware that after you conquer a territory, "they" will want to get it back.

  • Replayability: We're working our best to give you unlimited replayability. The map changes every run you play and your strategy should adapt to it.
